title: FWSSP Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the FWSSP adapter

custom_site_section_id.description: custom Site Section tag (e.g. ss_12345) or numeric Site Section ID (e.g. 12345)

profile_id.description: The value should contain a profile name. and NOT a numeric profile ID. This can either include the network ID prefix (e.g. 123456:profile_name_xyz123) or with the profile name alone (e.g. profile_name_xyz123)
